# Portal Stabilization (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[Portal (Domain)|Portal]] 1, [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels).

**Target:** One portal

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Underdark (WotC), pg. 60

You temporarily stabilize a malfunctioning *portal,* making it safer for use. Any time the *portal* is activated during the duration of this spell (or immediately, if it is continuously active), add +30% to the required roll on Table 2â€“2: Portal Malfunction in the *Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting*.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 2, Wizard 2 to Level.
